synthesis_conditions.loading_method: Single-crystal X-ray diffraction (SCXRD) studies after loading C2H2 to ZJU-50a

binding_sites.interaction: strong Coulomb interaction with open CuII site and C-H···O interactions
interacts with C-H groups from surrounding phenyl rings and ethyl groups through weak supramolecular interactions
interacts with adjacent C2H2 molecules through C-H···C-H interactions

synthesis_conditions.gas_cluster: largest C2H2-gas cluster observed among all the MOFs reported so far

synthesis_conditions.loading_method: Single-crystal X-ray diffraction (SCXRD) studies after loading CO2 to ZJU-50a

binding_sites.interaction: each copper site binds with one CO2 molecule
